nodes.text: Raid on Imperial Pay Station RMH-1973

Shortly after 3650 BBY, during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire, the criminals Risha Drayen and Beryl Thorne raided Imperial Pay Station RMH-1973, a pay station of the Imperial Treasury Department. Operating under the alias "Risha Xanthous," Drayen masterminded a heist of the station with Thorne, but the heist went bad and Thorne was captured. Drayen escaped, causing the Treasury Department to issue a 1,000,000 bounty on "Risha Xanthous," and Thorne resented Drayen for not rescuing her from the Imperials.

The raid on Pay Station RMH-1973 was first mentioned in the conversation "Restless Spirits" with the Smuggler companion character Risha Drayen in Star Wars: The Old Republic a video game released by BioWare in 2011. The 2012 reference guide Star Wars: The Old Republic Encyclopedia expanded on the heist.
